divs: sighting detailsi and my 2 cousin's which are 15&16 were watching the meteor shower on the prime day of it at 1am in the morning and i noticed a star like object appeared far off near like it was one of the star's in the heaven's it came out of nowhere and then went a section across the sky then disappeared into thin air it did not have a dust trail at all we all seen this i have never payed any attention to ufo stuff until now and i believe it was a ufo because ive have seen this same display before and my family didnt believe me till i looked that night and brought the subject upand they seen the star move too then disappear. could it possible be something else ive been looking into this and finding that there is evidence that i just cant ignore that is why im submitting this because i seen your studies of ufo's and was afraid to say anything because people might think im crazy. sincerely scottie deason p.s. i have 10\10 vision which is 2 lines below 20\20
